thread.title: Swansea City coach delighted over Andre Ayew's goal against Tottenham
thread.title_full: Swansea City coach delighted over Andre Ayew's goal against Tottenham

title: Swansea City coach delighted over Andre Ayew's goal against Tottenham
text:
Sports News | 5 October 2015 09:10 CET Swansea City coach delighted over Andre Ayew's goal against Tottenham - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Swansea City coach Garry Monk has expressed delight over Andre Ayew’s goal against Tottenham which gave them the lead in the 2-2 in the Premier League match. 
The Ghana international’s header powered in the opener for the Swans in their 2-2 drawn game on Sunday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
